mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PurchasePlanListItem (WishListID, MemberID, PlanName, PlanAmount, PlanPeriod) VALUES (#{wishListID}, #{memberID}, #{planName}, #{planAmount}, #{planPeriod})
mapper.select: select p.memberID as memberID, p.wishListID as wishListID, p.purchasePlanID as purchasePlanID, p.planName as planName, p.planAmount as planAmount, p.planPeriod as planPeriod, p.allocationRatio as allocationRatio, w.title as title, w.image as image, w.price as price from PurchasePlanListItem p join WishListItem w on w.WishListID = p.WishListID where w.memberID = #{memberID}
